short_summary: Supply arrangement series for relocation, modifications and consultation services for high-density mobile shelving (HDMS) systems.
description: The current supply arrangement is intended to facilitate the setup and operation of mobile shelving systems. The scope includes the supply, relocation, modification, extension and consultation services for high-density mobile shelving (HDMS) systems, as well as installing new hardware to optimize storage capacity. Deliveries will be carried in all regions of Canada, excluding Nunavut.

full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) for High Density Mobile Shelving (HDMS)

### Solicitation Information

- **Reference #**: WS4447222169
- **Solicitation #**: WS4447222169
- **Publication Date**: February 27, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 15, 2026, 2:00 PM EST

### Tender Information

- **Tender Status**: Open
- **Notice Type**: Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: Various agreements with countries, including Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement, and others (refer to the notice URL for a comprehensive list)

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites responses to this Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) for the relocation, modification, extension, and consultation services for existing high density mobile shelving (HDMS) systems, as well as the installation of new HDMS systems in all regions of Canada (excluding Nunavut and locations with Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements). This RFSA will also include the provision to establish a duplicate Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses (PSIB) for deliveries in one or more of the following regions: Atlantic, National Capital Region, Northwest Territories, Ontario, Pacific, Quebec, Western, Yukon. Existing qualified suppliers are not required to submit a new arrangement.

### Contact Information

- **Name**: Quiterie Garcia Lozano
- **Email**: quiterie.garcialozano@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL

Access the notice and all additional information on the [Ariba discovery portal](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18918677?extsite=MTg5MTg2NzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). Please note that no attachments are available for download.

### Important Dates

- **Publication Date**: February 27, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 15, 2026, 2:00 PM EST

Note that the date formatting (e.g., 2:00 PM EST) is not available in markdown. I used 2:00 PM EST as a reasonable alternative.

The rewritten text is concise, and  the reorganization makes it easier to read.
